text:
Hey I am having a bit of a battle with custom objects, we have a property that is a multi select called keystage, and you can select KS 1, KS 2 etc
Then we are using the following code to try and filter based on this field like so
```{% set resources = crm_objects("resource", "&limit=100&keystage__contains=KS 1", "keystage, keystage_label, availability, resourcetitle, resourcedescription, resource_thumbnail") %}```
